wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Peter Martin (born 28 February 1980) is a retired Welsh footballer. He is a former Welsh Under-21 international and played in the Football League for Crystal Palace, Torquay United and Hereford United before dropping into non-league football. He was manager of Isthmian League side Merstham between 2011 and 2012.

response: In August 2011, Dsane joined Merstham whose manager Andy Martin was a former teammate of D'Sane at Crystal Palace.
Andy Martin (born 1945) is an American perennial candidate for political office.

*Andy Martin (footballer, born 1896) (1896-1978), Scottish footballer for Blackpool, Halifax Town, Rochdale and Torquay United
